name: sbeqal2i
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2

body.origin:
|- wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
-| diffss(s0, s2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
-| diffss(s0, s2)

comment: If ` x = y ` implies ` x = z ` , then we can infer ` z = y ` . (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 3-Jun-2011.)
